channel.title: Help With Loading Files From FTP
channel.description:
I was wondering if anyone knew how to load files from an ftp.
The help would be greatly appriciated.
Thankyou,
~Zandia

item.title: Help With Loading Files From FTP
item.dc:creator: @remove_later remove_later
item.description:
@remove_later wrote:

I’m pretty sure it downloads the file first, which is what this method is for:

	public File getFile(String url_, String name, String dir)
	{
		URL url = new URL(url_);
		URLConnection urlc = url.openConnection();
		byte buff[] = new byte[urlc.getContentLength()];
		InputStream is = urlc.getInputStream();
		DataInputStream dis = new DataInputStream(is);
		dis.readFully(buff);
		dis.close();
		String comp = dir;
		comp.concat(name);
		File f = new File(comp);
		FileOutputStream fis = new FileOutputStream(f);
		fis.write(buff);
		fis.close();
		return f;
	}

Read full topic
item.source: Help With Loading Files From FTP
